products.description: Made from bees foraging in two distinct regions of Brazil â€” the northeast region, which produces a lighter-colored, delicately flavored honey, and the tropical southern region, home to a darker honey with a noticeably robust flavor.

Complete bowl coverage No scraping necessary; mix Hands free with excellent results every time; Planetary mixing rotates the beaters around the 4 quart, stainless steel bowl, for even and complete mixing.

This wall print decor makes a great conversation piece. All our handmade wall art prints will surely put a smile on anyone's face. Our gallery quality, art designs and images are digitally hand crafted and printed on premium, Fuji photographic paper designed for a lifetime of enjoyment.
